1054.issue: [W1054] Missing suggested translation into uk of some "common.news" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/io-package.json).

1056.issue: [W1056] js-controller 5.0.19 listed as dependency but 6.0.11 is recommended. Please consider updating dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/io-package.json).

1057.issue: [E1057] admin 5.1.28 listed as dependency but 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please update globalDependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1102.issue: [S1102] Consider adding 'vis-2' to "common.restartAdapters" as 'vis' is already listed in [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/io-package.json)

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5020.issue: [W5020] "gulpfile.js" found in repo but "gulp" not found at devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/package.json). Check whether it can be removed.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

5033.issue: [W5033] method "deleteState()" is deprecated and will be removed with future js-controller version. Please use "set/deleteObject()" instead.

6009.issue: [W6009] Multiple copyright lines found in [README.md](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/README.md) but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

7003.issue: [W7003] Multiple copyright lines found in LICENSE but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#332] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/issues/332)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.chromecast/blob/master/package.json).
